Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface TurnPhase

All Known Implementing Classes:
Build, End, Move, Start
public interface TurnPhase

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void executePhase​(Player currentPlayer, CommunicationController communicationController, ActionController actionController, Map map, java.util.List<Player> opponents, java.util.List<WinCondition> winConditions, MatchStory matchStory)
    This method executes the current phase of the turn

  • Method Details

    • executePhase

      void executePhase​(Player currentPlayer, CommunicationController communicationController, ActionController actionController, Map map, java.util.List<Player> opponents, java.util.List<WinCondition> winConditions, MatchStory matchStory) throws TimeOutException, ChannelClosedException
      This method executes the current phase of the turn
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - Current player
      communicationController - Communication controller
      actionController - Action controller
      map - Map of the match
      opponents - Player's opponents
      winConditions - List of win conditions
      matchStory - Last turn story
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out
      ChannelClosedException - Exception thrown when communication channel is closed
